attributes.action: Allow single parent over 65 to join UK resident as adult dependent.
attributes.additional_details: I believe there are alot of people having similar situation.
attributes.background: I have a fragile mom living alone from the country I originally from. I would like her to join us in the UK. Both my husband and I are working. All we want to do is to spend time with her and take care of her and not use any benefits.  We could even pay for her medication.
